channel.title: HL2 HUD error
channel.description:
I got the HL2 Update mod everyone's talking about with the most recent patch. The graphics are awesome, but there is one concern i have regarding the HUD
[img]https://pics.livejournal.com/lagsy/pic/0000abw8[/img]
The crosshair has a Q over it, and the crowbar icon has been replaced with the letter C. Don't ask me.
That's basically all I can't live with, but if it has any relevance, the Pause screen title text simply says HALF-LIFE', and the scripted Strider sequence at the beginning didn't happen.

item.title: HL2 HUD error
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
The Laughing Man:

This is this mode right? https://games.softpedia.com/get/Mods-Addons/Half-Life-2-Update-Mod.shtml

but, isn’t it useless? i mean, wasn’t half life 2 already updated to the Ep2 engine?

and…
Here are some key features of “Half-Life 2 Update Mod”:

· Updated to Orange Box Engine.
· HDR (High Dynamic Range) Lighting.
· Updated Models & Textures.
· Includes 32 Steam Achievements

those 32 steam achievements, are they new? because i have 33 o my steam profile.

Can anyone clarify?^^ Thanks!

The achievements are there in stock HL2, but the mod still changes stuff because it seems like without the mod HL2 doesn’t use HDR or the updated water effects (at least for me)

Read full topic

item.title: HL2 HUD error
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
not surprising at all, corrosion takes a long time to go through metal contacts

you should have waited more than overnight though

Read full topic

item.title: HL2 HUD error
item.dc:creator: doomyshadowsquirrels
item.description:
I do too. But my desk is tiny, and the back two inches got runoff from the shelf above them. That was a lucky break too. Lucky it was just water as well, I was this close to choosing soda ^^’

Read full topic

item.title: HL2 HUD error
item.dc:creator: calhoun_freeman
item.description:
Man, be careful. That’s why I put computer under my desk so that I don’t fuck up anything on accident. kicks computer on accident

Read full topic

item.title: HL2 HUD error
item.dc:creator: doomyshadowsquirrels
item.description:
On a completely unrelated note, I just spilled A LOT of water onto my case last night. I immediately cut the power, toweled off the innards (the videocard and the fans got the bulk of it), and left it off overnight for any unseen water to evaporate.

I consider myself extremely lucky for my brand new computer to still be working. Just wanted to share that.

Read full topic

item.description:
it came out before the valve update and even after that was out for a while, stock hl2 was still kinda broken.
